title: Relates to disregarding certain payments from the calculation of total spending for the purposes of adopting contingency budgets
summary: Provides that certain payments by a board of cooperative educational services for construction or rental of facilities shall be disregarded from the calculation of total spending for the purposes of adopting contingency budgets.

       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          904

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. DESTITO -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A. BARCLAY
         -- read once and referred to the Committee on Education

       AN  ACT  to amend the education law, in relation to disregarding certain
         payments required to be made by a  board  of  cooperative  educational
         services  from  the  calculation of total spending for the purposes of
         adopting contingency budgets

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subparagraph  (vii)  of  paragraph  b of subdivision 4 of
    2  section 2023 of the education law, as added by section 1 of part D-2  of
    3  chapter 57 of the laws of 2007, is amended to read as follows:
    4    (vii) expenditures for payments to charter schools pursuant to section
    5  twenty-eight hundred fifty-six of this chapter[.]; AND
    6    S  2.  Subparagraph  (vii)  of paragraph b of subdivision 4 of section
    7  2023 of the education law, as added by chapter 422 of the laws of  2007,
    8  is amended and a new subparagraph (ix) is added to read as follows:
    9    [(vii)] (VIII) expenditures for self-supporting programs. For purposes
   10  of this subparagraph, "self-supporting programs" shall mean any programs
   11  that  are  entirely  funded by private funds that cover all the costs of
   12  the program[.]; AND
   13    (IX) THE AMOUNT ALLOCATED TO THE SCHOOL DISTRICT PURSUANT TO PARAGRAPH
   14  G OF SUBDIVISION FIVE OF SECTION NINETEEN HUNDRED FIFTY  OF  THIS  TITLE
   15  FOR,  ANY  PAYMENT BY A BOARD OF COOPERATIVE EDUCATIONAL SERVICES TO THE
   16  DORMITORY AUTHORITY OR ANY PAYMENT REQUIRED BY A  BOARD  OF  COOPERATIVE
   17  EDUCATIONAL  SERVICES  TO  ACQUIRE OR CONSTRUCT A SCHOOL FACILITY OF THE
   18  BOARD OF COOPERATIVE EDUCATIONAL SERVICES, AND ANY PAYMENTS  FOR  RENTAL
   19  OF FACILITIES BY A BOARD OF COOPERATIVE EDUCATIONAL SERVICES.
   20    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
